item.keepsakes.eternal_snowflake.tooltip: A frigid, complex fractal that contains the essence of Winter.
item.keepsakes.eternal_snowflake.frost_w: - Freezes with a radius of 3 blocks around the player
- Does not require the player to be grounded first
item.keepsakes.harvesters_scythe.tooltip: It takes a brave man to look death in the eye and claim they don't need help.
